full_summary:
**RFx Identifier**
=====================================================

* **Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation)**: WS4495813369
* **Amendment Number (numéro de modification)**: 2
* **Publication Date (date de publication)**: 2024-03-25
* **Closing Date (date limite de soumission)**: 2024-04-15T14:00:00

**Tender Invitation**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the charter of a fishing vessel for conducting scientific research on the Newfoundland and Labrador Grand Bank. The research requirements include bottom trawling and deployment and recovery of oceanographic moorings.

This tender is issued pursuant to the Department's Supply Arrangement (SA) # F6160-210004 and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The Department will conduct a selective tendering process to identify the most suitable vendor.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The selected vendor will be responsible for chartering a fishing vessel of at least 65 ft (or larger) to conduct the scientific research on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO). The research will be conducted on the Newfoundland and Labrador Grand Bank.

**Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information regarding this tender invitation, please contact:

* Genevieve Petten, (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The tender documents and technical specifications will be made available on the Government of Canada's Bid Solicitation Website.

**Language of Communication**
------------------------------

English and French.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

None.

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

* Newfoundland and Labrador

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact End User**
-------------------

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A
